TextBlock.Text: SENNETTI: I must admit this discovery is rather embarrassing. Apparently I had previously mistaken the Dree adjective modifiers for "hostile" and "neutral".
AZOLLA: Interesting, what led to that error?

SENNETTI: In our discussions, Ditylum kept using a particular adjective while referring to the group of three anglerfish in one of the nodes near <color=orange>Shattered Hearth</color>. I had previously assumed this to be an adjective roughly translating to â€œaggressive,â€? but it apparently means â€œneutralâ€? or â€œtame.â€?
AZOLLA: Peculiar. Would this imply that those anglerfish actually are not hostile?
SENNETTI: I believe it does. Do still exercise caution, it is possible I still do not wholly understand the translation.
NESIA: Don't fret, Sennetti, it happens to the best of us.
